title: 1.11.2官服报错
author: Tommer
txt_content:
[18:22:35] [Server thread/WARN]: Can't keep up! Did the system time change, or is the server overloaded? Running 6256ms behind, skipping 125 tick(s)
[18:23:14] [Server thread/WARN]: Can't keep up! Did the system time change, or is the server overloaded? Running 20926ms behind, skipping 418 tick(s)
[18:23:18] [Server thread/WARN]: Can't keep up! Did the system time change, or is the server overloaded? Running 2096ms behind, skipping 41 tick(s)
[18:26:51] [Server thread/WARN]: Boat moved wrongly!
[18:26:51] [Server thread/WARN]: Boat moved wrongly!

怎么解决？ 会很卡

replies.author: PL-极地之光
replies.txt_content:
前3条系统超负荷；
最后2条指有船移动过快（可忽略）.
应该是内存不足的原因，加内存即可.

replies.author: Tommer
replies.txt_content:
PL-极地之光 发表于 2017-1-23 22:22
前3条系统超负荷；
最后2条指有船移动过快（可忽略）.
应该是内存不足的原因，加内存即可. ...
内存够的啊

@echo off
set bindir=%~dp0
CD /D "%bindir%"
"%ProgramFiles%\Java\jre7\bin\java.exe" -Xincgc -Xmx5g -jar minecraft_server.1.11.2.jar
pause

Xmx都5G了 还不够么 这不可能啊

replies.author: PL-极地之光
replies.txt_content:
Tommer 发表于 2017-1-23 22:47
内存够的啊

@echo off
那您的服务端是否崩过，或者非正常关服？

replies.author: Tommer
replies.txt_content:
PL-极地之光 发表于 2017-1-23 22:51
那您的服务端是否崩过，或者非正常关服？
有崩过 是因为内存不足 我改成了5G就没事了
非正常关服好像有过

replies.author: 化丶冰
replies.txt_content: 能让我看一下你服务端的运行代码吗？

replies.author: Tommer
replies.txt_content:
化丶冰 发表于 2017-1-23 23:08
能让我看一下你服务端的运行代码吗？
上一楼不是吗

replies.author: Tommer
replies.txt_content:
我修改了一下参数
@ECHO OFF
java -Xms1g -Xmx5g -XX:+AggressiveOpts -XX:+UseCompressedOops -jar minecraft_server.1.11.2.jar
pause
但还是不行
一样报错
而且卡的时候好像只有生物卡 挖方块好像不卡
